contextId.information: Peter speaks of the truth about Jesus Christ as something that believers could actually receive, as if it were an object. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: to those who have received the same precious faith

contextId.information: The reasons that the world is doomed to be destroyed are spoken of as if they were objects in the world. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: the corruption that is in the world

contextId.information: You can translate "knowledge" using a verbal phrase. AT: "through your knowing God and Jesus our Lord." See how you translated a similar phrase in [[:en:bible:notes:2pe:01:01|1:2]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ

contextId.information: You can translate "grace" and "knowledge" using verbal phrases. See how you translated similar phrases in [[:en:bible:notes:2pe:01:01|1:2]] and [[:en:bible:notes:2pe:01:08|1:8]] and [[:en:bible:notes:2pe:02:20|2:20]]. AT: "experience more and more our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ acting kindly toward you, and that you get to know him better and better" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]]).
contextId.quote: the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ
